## Resources.IDeltaGeneratorOptions interface

Interface for options controlling delta generation behavior.

**Signature:**

```typescript

```

</td><td>

ReadonlyArray&lt;string&gt;


</td><td>

_(Optional)_ Array of specific resource IDs to include in delta generation. If not provided, generates deltas for all resources in the delta resolver.
